title: Bug 10022: Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
OB: The 'Build' popup action is incorrectly enabled even when a manual build is not needed. This occurs even if the build has already been done automatically.
EB: The 'Build' popup action should only be enabled when a manual build is required or if no automatic build has been performed. In cases where the build is already done automatically, the 'Build' action should be disabled.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the build settings.
2. Ensure that an automatic build has been performed.
3. Check the 'Build' popup action's enablement status. It should be disabled since a manual build is not needed when an automatic build has already been done.
